text:
A new tabloid report claims Ben Affleck didn’t buy a diamond ankle bracelet for girlfriend Lindsay Shookus because his ex-fiancee, Jennifer Lopez , has a similar piece of jewelry. Did this really happen? Gossip Cop looked into the story and we’ve exclusively learned the truth. An article in the latest issue of Star asserts the actor […]

title: Ben Affleck Didn’t Buy Diamond Bracelet Because Jennifer Lopez Has It?
